website_summaries.verdict: Its solid build with adjustable handle is a good concept, but reported flaws may prevent it from standing up to tough jobs. It's also not ideal if you need a portable option.
pros: Retractable handle extends as long as 44 in
Features a wide steel scoop and spade
cons: Pricey, yet not the most effective model
The locking mechanism on the handles tends to slip

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Used only once and it started to separate from base. Set aside to start return and noticed the scooper was doing the same thing. Piece of crap! Do not waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: MMeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and well made. The only issue is my own fault. I should have paid attention to the size description, because it's so large and sturdy (you could almost clean up after a horse with it) that it's hard for me to lift, so I need to get the small one. Extending them was no problem at all. Was very impressed with overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: Palominolady

customer_reviews.title: Designed to Fail
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large scoop and spade set in March, liked it, and bought another one in May. We have a lot of dogs (4). Then what started to happen was that all of the adjustment connection joints started going bad. Here it is in June and all 4 pieces have become useless unless my repair work will hold up. I bought some hose clamps (33mm) and tightened them around the shafts with the idea that it would hold the pieces together and stable. One clamp didn't work, so I put two on each joint. Time will tell if this does the trick. Not worth the aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: L Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable scoop for the p**p
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE EDIT: OK, I think I was a little too critical of this product when I first purchased it. so far, it's been months, and it's held up nicely. Sure, the handle did slip a bit when I first started using it, but I think it's settled in now. I do like how it's strong enough to really get after stubborn 'piles' when needed... even good enough to 'swipe' a weed sticking up above the grass! PRIOR review: Only used twice and the handle is already loose enough to retract back into the handle. I think we’re still ok, but its needs to be reinforced.
customer_reviews.author: 1inTexas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about some of the bad reviews...as this is a fantastic product. Very well made & takes a beating (I’m pretty rough about hitting the ground/grass with the shovel when picking up, and banging the receptacle on the trash when dumping). This purchase is to replace the same item we’ve had for over 5 years. Only had to replace because we left it outside in the AZ heat & rain which eventually led to rusting. But, again...it is very sturdy and lasted over 5 years...used & abused twice daily! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA A CARSON

customer_reviews.title: Great construction. Love the telescopic function!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I sit dogs and scoop a lot of mutt muffins. This is perfect. I am tall... no bending. Well made. I only use a paddle not a rake. Empty easily. More importantly, easy to spray off for clean up. The enameled like surface helps like a non-stick service compared to plastic or plain metal. I don't know why people are giving this product bad reviews. I cannot believe it broke quickly. This puppy is made well. If you believe anyone, believe the person that scoops 10lb of poop a day! Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne b.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap....and Replacing it with the Company is Questionable - 30 Day Return Pooper Scooper....LOL
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use this pooper scooper. It already has fallen apart at the bottom of the pan 4 months later. It looks like the bottom pan was not welded right to the handle. I have a roof top garden on top of my Townhome. My dogs have a doggy door that goes up to the roof top. They only use it at night, which is rare. I like it so I can sleep and they do not have to wake me up. I do not recommend this product. It is easier to purchase from a Petco. It is quick and easier to return....you can either get a store credit or a replacement of the same item.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Not bolted together!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Cadillac of scoopers EXCEPT the handle is not bolted to the tray! There are bolts in the handle securing it to a small piece of metal which is soldered or glued to the tray. It just falls apart! I would totally give this five stars if it had stayed together. It is wonderfully made except for that. Anyone know how to solder? 😰 I was about to buy one for my son, but it broke. So sad! It is the best when it works!
customer_reviews.author: tennisgg

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: These things are heavy duty. I have had two other kinds that both broke where the handle meets the scoop box. all the bending it forward to get a good angle. Anyways, this one is super heavy duty and is lasting far longer than the other ones. That said, it is heavy to carry around. but its not going to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald S.

customer_reviews.title: Sooper Pooper Scooper
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty pooper scooper gets the job done. The tray is big enough to hold a day's worth of output from my two German Shepherds. I love the adjustable handles on both the tray and the pusher. You don't have to stoop to scoop!
customer_reviews.author: Cable Gal

customer_reviews.title: Handles are weak
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time buying this brand of pooper scooper. I like that the pan spade are made of thick tough metal. We have cement runs and the spade on our old pooper scoopers wear down. When I received this one, I tried out the extension which gives you more reach. When I put some pressure on the spade, the handle bent. I was able to push the handle down to a shorter length and seems ok, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Big
customer_reviews.text: This is just the size I was looking for. I have multiple dogs and it is convenient to be able to clean up more than one mess at a time. It works especially well on concrete and just fine on grass as well. It is well built. After reading previous reviews, some mentioning how difficult it was to remove the sticker, I must say that the sticker was already coming off upon arrival. I had no problem pealing it off, no residue sticking to the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Length lock sucks, rest is good.
customer_reviews.text: This product has one fatal design flaw. The main scoop is a twist to secure type lock on the height. When you lock it in the longest height a full scooper full of poop puts strain on it. When you have ANY other height and you have a full load, any sideways movement will send the poop hurling when the lock releases. I used it this past weekend and lost poop on 4 different trips to the dumpster. I love the size for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Archi.inak

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for those that use walkers or canes.  Great.scooper!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a walker and now canes for balance to walk. I bought this because I broke 3 sets of those little plastic brooms. I bought this to use as scooped canes. The other reviews are correct, it you put your whole weight on them, the rivets could break or the height that you adjust to use it might change to a shorter lentth. Mine are going strong, or highly recommend them to others!
customer_reviews.author: KrisTiki

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Does its job and is well made. The adjustable telescopic handles is really a plus, not so much stooping over when using it and a lot easier on my back. Would recommend buying this one. No negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Salliezoo

customer_reviews.title: Quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: If you need to use this product a lot then it is not a good selection. The quality can not stand up to lots of use. I have a dog kennel and the extension feature comes loose and the plastic pieces cracked immediately, making it wobbly to use. The scoop pan is sturdy but the handle can not support the amount of waste the scoop pan can hold.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith L Day

customer_reviews.title: The rivets and welded portion were all rusted like it had been sitting outside for years
customer_reviews.text: This item fell apart, just after 1 month of owning it!!! Beware... this seems to be a common issue with this product! The handle came attached from the scoop portion when I picked it up. The rivets and welded portion were all rusted like it had been sitting outside for years. Horribly made!!!!! My last one lasted about 10 years.... this one, just over one month!!! Just past the one month return policy so I'm out the money!&!$!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works great until pan falls off of handle.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it is just glued, but I have bought several of these. They are heavy duty and hold lots of poop, but... The handle cracks at the joint and the tray, breaks off the handle. There are no screws or rivets. When the handle falls off there is rust on both parts in between.
customer_reviews.author: blossom

customer_reviews.title: Great poop scoop!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many poop scoopers over the years, and this one is probably the best. To say it’s sturdy is an understatement. I have a GSD, and she has some whopper poop piles. I can get a ton of them in this thing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product! Broke in 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: WORST product ever! Bought this scooper and the handle was all wobbly. I then put it to the test and used it for a couple days. On the third day the handle broke right off the scooping pan. I tried to give this company another chance and called the company. It always went to voicemail. I left multiple messages and NO call back ever! Never seen such horrible customer service. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Stargaze0909

customer_reviews.title: It shovels poo!
customer_reviews.text: It does not do this arduous task for you, but it does work nicely. The size is good, sometimes the poo goes over the side and you have to scoop it again, risking the dreaded mashed-poo, which seems to smell a lot more than un-mashed-poo. But if you are in the poop shoveling business, or just a hobby of yours, stop using your hands and get a shovel like this. Or at least guy some good soap.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Frankel

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: When this product arrived, I immediately tried to use it as the one I previously had for several years finally broke and the messes we're piling up. First mess I tried to clean up the welds on the back of the scooper broke and it was rendered useless. I definitely expected to get a few years out of this product but didn't even get one clean up. I tried contacting support via email on the manufacturer website and over a week has gone by with no response. I guess my only recourse is writing a poor review so maybe someone else can avoid a similar situation.
customer_reviews.author: PCRFC5

customer_reviews.title: ... few months so I thought now would be a good time to review it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this now for a few months so I thought now would be a good time to review it. I have three large dogs so clean up happens twice a day for me. I love the adjustable handles but sadly the plastic fasteners break too easily so I had to use duct tape to keep them in place. I hope maybe they will change that part as I am sure I will need to buy another one at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Fadingrockstar

customer_reviews.title: The large size is pretty large.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the picture is actually for the small size when I ordered it. Seems sturdy and it will last a while even being left out in the elements. However it is a bit heavy to lug around. Great if you happen to own an elephant or dinosaur, as this thing can sure hold a lot of poop. Next time around I will probably go back to the smaller and easier to carry around size.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kleinwaks

customer_reviews.title: breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of poop scoopers over the years, they all break too soon, but this one wins first prize for how quickly it broke. The handle breaks away from the tray. How hard can it be to make one of these so that the handle doesnt break away from the tray so easily? I think the makers of these does it like this so you have to keep reordering new ones. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Terry V.

customer_reviews.title: this scoop is precious pet product available for 35.00 from other dealers- represented as a different scoop for twice as much!!
customer_reviews.text: Misleading advertisement. I was looking for heavy duty scoop for rescue- i had purchased 4 scoopers- little stinker & since this scoop appeared to be different brand twice as expensive I assumed it was a different product. It turns out it was same manufacturer different supplier and instead of 35.00 it cost 80.00. I am really upset over this false representation of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Colette Winfrey

customer_reviews.title: 2 Great Danes
customer_reviews.text: We have tried MANY scoops for our dogs. We gave up and used a scoop shovel & rake. But that would break up the poop and make impossible to get it all. Our teenage boy would never do a good job and would take days to get and have to start over. He went out today and cleaned THE WHOLE BACK YARD. He said this product is amazing. He held the weight & did not bend. He did the whole back yard in about an hour and DID NOT COMPLAIN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a heavy duty pooper scooper!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of thin, cheap aluminum and plastic scooper sets. This is my third, and hopefully, my last pooper scooper set to purchase for years. This set is heavy duty, which I need. I have four 20 pound dogs, so as you can imagine, I scoop lots of poops!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette French Design

customer_reviews.title: Can't extend the handle on the pan!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of ****. Pun intended. It says "Extra long handle." Notice that "handle" is not plural!!! Very misleading. You can extend the handle on the scooper part, but not on the pan. The only good thing about it is that pan is very heavy so maybe it can stay upright by itself while you scoop. Not what I expected. I will use this on my side yard where the dogs only go occasionally. I'll use my old scooper with 'EXTRA LONG HANDLES" in my dog run.
customer_reviews.author: Carrina Hotianovich

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Review - Updated
customer_reviews.text: From the start I really liked this tool. However, almost immediately the adjustable handle locks got really got real flaky and would become unlocked. Now after 7-months the spot welds on the pan came apart making it unusable. It is a real shame because this could have received 5-stars with a little quality control. Updated* - I contacted the manufacturer directly and they sent out a complete new unit with no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: MAY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pooper picker upper!
customer_reviews.text: This thing can pick up terds! Strong and wide for the biggest of poops, and when you have labs you never know what will come out. Some of the other versions can only hold about h Alf of a single pile. But with this one you can pile it on up!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Ligman

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I held on to this for a month or so before using it. Second use, one side of the part connecting the pole to the pan came undone. Third, other side undone. Useless garbage and I am going to seek a refund. Update!! Company replaced. Been using ever since. Think I just got a faulty one.
customer_reviews.author: Trudat

customer_reviews.title: Good scooper
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that the shovel is fairly large but I would have preferred a rake style shovel. I wanted a metal handle so this is the one I chose. It held up so far and works well for the job!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Meshnick

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 large breed dogs and this product definitely makes cleaning up after them quicker and easier due to its large receiver/scooper. My only complaint is that the handles tend to unscrew as I'm using them, I'm right handed so it may not be an issue to lefties.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed on how the handle of the pan just completely detach itself after 7 mths of light/regular use. I guess I wasn’t the first one to report the same issue. DON’T BUY THIS, stay away and get a different brand with a longer life span.
customer_reviews.author: basenjis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pooper Scooper!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe that I'm taking the time to write this, but after reading some negative reviews, I bought this product anyway. It is excellent!! The design makes it so very easy to maneuver, and it is not too heavy. Really perfect. You don't need to keep searching :)
customer_reviews.author: Sari

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: I've had no issues with the handle like some have. It's been in use several months now without any problems. I store it under cover, so there's minimal weathering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but love the durability!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had a well-used wood/aluminum set that had given out so we bought this to be more substantial and to hold more. It is and it does! We have 3 dogs to clean up after so this makes the daily chore 100% easier and faster. But when it comes to weight...they are heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Art Lady Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These things are not cheap. You definitely get what you pay for. Glad we paid a little more to get a set we were happy with. (If only my kid was as happy to use it!😆)
customer_reviews.author: Shep's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy to use and re-use
customer_reviews.text: The Best Buy ever. I have 6 dogs. 2 little poopers & 4 big poopers! I LOVE THIS TOOL. The poop cleaning squad (me) loves the ease in use. Grassy areas or flat dirt areas. Works well. Long handle. Easy grip. Adjustable height! No bad things. Not flimsy. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Junemarie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but super heavy
customer_reviews.text: I work at a dog rescue and so it takes a while to clean the yard each day. This scooper is seriously heavy duty, but also heavy which becomes pretty uncomfortable, pretty quick. Gets the job done, but wish it was easier to lug around the property.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Makes scooping poop even more unpleasant!
customer_reviews.text: The handle will NOT stay where I put it! Very frustrating to start to scoop and have the handle spin on you. DO NOT BUY. I will have to replace. I gave 2 stars because I like the size and so far the base has stayed on the handle. I guess I'll try duct tape first.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Todd

customer_reviews.title: Does the duty...cleans up poopy!
customer_reviews.text: I have a little Labrador Retriever/Rhodesian Ridgeback Mix puppy who puts out a lot of poop. In 3 days he had my whole yard covered. This scooper set was just what I needed to keep my yard in tip-top shape and poop free. This holds a lot of poop and the adjustable handles are nice as I am a taller person and like the extra length. The scooper and spade are made out of metal so I can leave them outside and they will not get damaged. I highly recommend this set to anyone that has a larger breed dog and that needs to clean up poop. You can clear up a lot of junk with this with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was going to be really great. The handle was welded to the base and a POOR welding job at that. Starting using it in April 2018 the handle came off in July 2018. I would not purchase this again and would not recommend to a friend. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: Best pooper scooper ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pooper scooper that I have found in 30 yrs of having dogs. I am 6’3” and this adjusts easily to fit me. Honey bucket detail is quick and easy. I have 2 75lb Labs who generate piles of poop. This unit makes it easy to keep up with cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Grady

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This looks very well made. My daughter has 2 large dogs and a medium sized dog so this large size will be great for picking up their leavings without having to go back and forth too many times.
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: Awful Product
customer_reviews.text: I never take time to write reviews but I felt the obligation to share with other folks how awful this product is. I used it for about 5 mins and the shovel head became un-hinged from the shaft portion. It looks as if it was poorly welded. Also, the “adjustable” functions to make the the shafts taller or shorter on both the shovel and receptacle do not stay in place. Even if the shovel staying in tact wasn’t an issue, the product is awkward to use since the heights won’t stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Durable product
customer_reviews.text: I have two dobermans, and a border-collie-lab mix. And these three produce a lot of poops to pick up. This product is heavy duty, and makes picking up after my pups easy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: TOO HEAVY, ordered aluminium one
customer_reviews.text: Good size to catch up after a few days off however way TOO heavy trying to carry that large STEEL container. Ordered an aluminium one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Speer

customer_reviews.title: Scoop Away!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 big dogs! Needless to say we are scooping a lot. This product is super sturdy and holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Reeski

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but heavier than other models
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality of the material, but I will not order another one of this type because of the weight. In the end, I prefer the weight and feel of the all-aluminum models. The handle length is adjustable, but I do not need this. If not tightly locked in place the handles will move and this is not desirable.
customer_reviews.author: tmiller

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time we tried to use it
customer_reviews.text: This broke the first time we used it. Poor quality. The weld holding the pole to the base was poorly executed and the slightest pressure to the handle broke it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa B

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING SAVED MY BACK !
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of my best purchases on amazon, perfect for large dogs. Has a huge tray, collect a weeks worth of poop. Both portions extend to match your height. Would highly recommend and even buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SMPLYMATT

customer_reviews.title: Best Scooper I have found
customer_reviews.text: We have backyard goats and chickens so we pickup twice a day. The scooper gets a lot of use and we need something that is strong and heavy duty. I feel like this scooper is good quality, heavy duty and strong but could use some minor design/component improvements in 2 areas: the handle becomes loose often and the adjustment cuff also can become loose with downward pressure. Overall, these 2 items wouldn't keep me from buying it again but it would make it 5 stars if these items could be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Voluntaryist

customer_reviews.title: And I put it through great use daily
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pooper scooper that won't fall apart after the 1st week. Is very heavy duty. Can get a little heavy with a full load. Been a Labrador breeder for over 20 yrs. Took this long to own a scooper that will keep up. Don't let the adjusting poles discourage you from buying. Set them at the height you want and then leave them alone. The only time they have moved on me is if I lean on it. Other than that, they haven't slipped on me. And I put it through great use daily. Will probably want to buy another at some time.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Dressler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I had been looking for. The size is large, for my large dog, and the item is sturdy and well made. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy's daughter

customer_reviews.title: Too big and heavy for me.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t working out for me. I have arthritis and the weight of it hurts my wrists. I also have difficulty with keeping the telescoping part from repeatedly collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Diane Roche Customer

customer_reviews.title: King Size!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting a scoop big enough to clean up after an elephant! For comparison my foot is a size 10. It’s huge. Super sturdy, handle doesn’t fee cheap and the extension is enough that my 5’10” self doesn’t have to bend over to use it. Great product, zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger pooper scooper
customer_reviews.text: Made well and rinses off great. Have GSDs and needed to better pick and this was a great find!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Dillenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after 3 weeks & no abuse!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy which made me hope that it would be sturdy. The extendable handle broke after only a few weeks of use. I have 3 little dogs & scoop my yard twice a day. Scoop is never full! No reason for it to break! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Grieg Vanlandingham

customer_reviews.title: good for scraping off of hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: good for scraping off of hard surfaces. The extension handles are ok, they don't stay put sometimes. Plastic plugs on the bottom of the posts won't stay in, but aren't really necessary.
customer_reviews.author: DoomScribe

customer_reviews.title: The metal has not rusted despite getting wet multiple times ...
customer_reviews.text: The metal has not rusted despite getting wet multiple times over the past few months that I've had this. The only downfall is that the connections where the pieces extend have loosened so they spin and at times the extensions collapse. Not ideal for the telescoping portion, but it is still functional as a shovel and scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet B.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best heavy duty pooper scooper ever!! Saves me from back pain. Who knew a person could get so excited over a pooper scooper?! Hahah
customer_reviews.author: Jamie5690

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: could never get the telescoping handle to open on the pan. Then the handle broke off the pan within two months. Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jamc103

customer_reviews.title: Had to return because the scoop end was never glued ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because the scoop end was never glued / welded to its base on the handle. So it just flopped around. I could have glued it or used JB Weld or something, but since it was loose I could see how it was made. I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: whitefishblue

customer_reviews.title: ... I have to say I couldn't have been more disappointed with the cheap crap offered by all the pet ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't usually do reviews but I have to say I couldn't have been more disappointed with the cheap crap offered by all the pet shops in my area. I went to all the major retailers. Then I found this one on Amazon and when it arrived I was very impressed. Its sturdy, durable, and I can see it lasting a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Misto

customer_reviews.title: Best scooper ever
customer_reviews.text: If you have giant dogs like me, just buy this. We went through three scoopers before this and I’ve have this for a while now and no problems at all! It’s going strong! Plus this is gross but you can pick up a lot at once. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne k

customer_reviews.title: Mostly sturdy. Had this for about a month and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly sturdy. Had this for about a month and the riveting around the scooper part is getting loose. Will update this review if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: echo1440

customer_reviews.title: Works for the short term only!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t last! Bought it less than 6 months ago and it’s cracked though the main handle on the scoop part.
customer_reviews.author: Dog MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful for picking up our dogs poo
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful for picking up our dogs poo. The "bucket" is on the smaller side, but we have 2 labs and I'm able to fill it fine. I find the scooper pretty good, but I also use a claw type one too
customer_reviews.author: kuttamum

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best poop scooper ever! Others are flimsy; this is a bit heavier than most but much more substantial and built to be heavy-duty. I run a rescue & shelter & boarding facility....we have TWO of these now and extremely pleased. Worth the additional $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Ludt

customer_reviews.title: Wore out a similar item, different brand.
customer_reviews.text: I like this one because it uses heavier metal, the handles have better reinforcement, and it washes clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: MEA

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but..
customer_reviews.text: With the first use, the shovel handle broke. flimsy material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not made for multiple dogs
customer_reviews.text: I own a Doggie Daycare/boarding kennel I was looking for a big scoop and a spade instead of a rake since I have concrete. Ordered 3 at 31.00 apiece Every single one the spade handle bent can’t handle a lot of poop. Waste of a 100.00 all three got thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: kelli jo

customer_reviews.title: flimsy construction
customer_reviews.text: the shovel was only glued to the handle pole and it broke off !!!!!!!!! i am beyond angry. how could such a big shovel be only glued to the handel. huge rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last like I thought it would!
customer_reviews.text: The scooper broke off the first week! Totally bummed cause I love how big the shovel and scoop are! Now the coating is peeling!
customer_reviews.author: RaeLinn O.

customer_reviews.title: Best pooper scooper available!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a dog daycare and we are so glad we found these. Large; sturdy and great quality, especially for the price. Only wish it came with a rake option.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice poop scoop
customer_reviews.text: This one is much better than others. It is heavy duty. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: scopin4u2Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Good durable scooper
customer_reviews.text: I have a Great Dane and a Boston Terrior. I bought the large size and it is perfect size for cleaning the Great Dan's mountains.
customer_reviews.author: irisherin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the "scraper" broke after only the second use. The last pooper scoop lasted me 20 years! I would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Anjelica

customer_reviews.title: No more leaning over!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice if you don't want to have to lean over to clean up dog poop. The shovel is large enough to clean up the whole years.
customer_reviews.author: F&G

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not bad.
customer_reviews.text: My annoyance with this product is that it is adjustable however it won’t stay in place after tightening it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great size if you have multiple dogs
customer_reviews.text: Heavy to lift in this size. Adjustible but won't stay' Goes up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Jene

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these as a donation for a Golden Retriever Sanctuary. They specifically asked for this model with the spade NOT the rack. After seeing it in use, I completely understand. It was easy for children and adults to use and made clean up easy. Good quality and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to adjust for height and has a large capacity, which is good if you have multiple large-breed dogs. However, it's rather heavy even empty.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The handle of the pan was difficult to extend and less than 4 months later I had to throw it out as the parts separated and it is impossible to get it back together. Too bad as the weld that held the handle to the pan was great. That has always been the cause of me throwing other units out. I was willing to pay more for what seemed like a better item, but sadly I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: As pictured, works great and durable. I can pack 2 days worth of dog poop in this before needing to dump it. I have a heeler and a GSP aka good sized dog poops.
customer_reviews.author: bubblegum

customer_reviews.title: best product on market!!
customer_reviews.text: i’ve had many scoopers over the years. this is durable steel and will last. The large size makes it easier to clean poo. I don’t have to carry a bucket with me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not bad, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: great idea for a better scooper, but the handle will not stay in place when at a higher setting, and keeps falling and twisting while you're trying to scoop with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: I guess the manufacturer doesnt take much pride in the product
customer_reviews.text: This scooper works great, it's just the handle is loose from when I opened the package and the seller said right off the bat, sorry we cant takethis back, amazon bought a bunch of these from us so you need to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: timmytunes

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy! This is a great tool for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy! This is a great tool for my pet waste removal business. I don't have to be scared that it will fall apart after an extended use.
customer_reviews.author: Meike

customer_reviews.title: Good but weak.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well! Had winter melt up here in Alaska, got this scooper to clean the mess. Was quite a challenge, but this scooper was excellent. It is however a little weak in the handles. Not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M.

customer_reviews.title: Love! We are a multiple Great Dane house hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Love! We are a multiple Great Dane house hold and the x-large tray makes clean up a breeze. Sturdy and good quality. Recommend for any household!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy from factory
customer_reviews.text: Began falling apart at first use. Drilled and added screws to handle and works fine now just needed to be reinforced.
customer_reviews.author: Remi13

customer_reviews.title: best pooper scooper
customer_reviews.text: very durable and the large base lets more pop get picked up. the handle is a little hard to adjust but overall it is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca lauderbaugh

customer_reviews.title: This product is great quality. A little on the heavy side but ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great quality. A little on the heavy side but like I said it is huge so that's expected.
customer_reviews.author: lafonte98

customer_reviews.title: Better than stepping in it!
customer_reviews.text: Beats the heck out of using your hand ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the quality of it but after 10 weeks the weld on the pan broke and I had to throw it away. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken: handle on scoop already broken off...so much for being heavy duty! Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jakester

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Poop Scooper
customer_reviews.text: Great for the job I needed it for. I own and operate a dog kennel and scooping poop is what we do ... not hosed down the run drains. I have used many scoopers and this one is sturdy and made with great materials. I believe it will hold up for many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Bennett

product_meta.title: Precision Pet by Petmate Little Stinker Heavy Duty Pooper Scoop with Spade -Extendable Handle - 2 Sizes Available, Large
product_meta.description: The Petmate Little Stinker Heavy Duty Poop Scoop provides a convenient and comfortable way to clean up after dogs. The dog poop scooper is equipped with an adjustable handle that extends up to 44 inches in length for a comfortable height for pet parents. The spade and pan are made of a durable, heavy-duty zinc-plated steel that stays stronger for longer. The metal material of the pet pooper scooper is easy to wipe down or hose off for simple cleaning. The handles have built-in hook holes for easy and convenient storage. The dog waste scooper comes pre-assembled and ready for immediate use. The Little Stinker heavy duty pooper scooper is offered in two sizes, small and large, to accommodate deposits of varying quantities.
feature_bullets: No Bending: The steel dog pooper scooper pan & spade are convenient for large dogs & backyard use. Handle extends to 44 inches to provide stainless & easy pick-ups. Handle has built-in hooks for storage.
Pooper Scooper For Large Dogs: The large heavy duty metal pooper scooper set is easy to wipe down & hose off. The deep scoop pan accommodates larger quantities of waste for quicker waste management.

Pet Clean Up: Swiftly clean up after your dog or cat while at home or on walks with a variety of waste management products. From waste bags, rakes, pans, trainings pads to poop scoopers, litter boxes & litter, we've got you & your pet covered.

Precision Pet: Precision Pet offers a variety of heavy-duty products such as wire crates, chicken coops & rabbit hutches that provide pets with a cozy & safe place to rest, nest & feed. Also features litter box accessories & more.

Just For Pets: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
